website_summaries.verdict: This scaled-down smart watch tracks your child's movement and steps, and includes a monster-catching game that encourages activity. Best for young elementary age children.
pros: Motion sensor for active play challenges
Two cameras for video and selfies
Comes with 55 digital and analog clock faces
cons: Screen develops dead pixels and breaks relatively easily

website_summaries.verdict: If your kids want a watch with the latest technology and features, this is the one. It provides entertainment and interactive games plus the ability to tell time.
pros: Features 3 activities, 5 games, action challenges, camera, and photo storage, as well as an alarm, timer, stopwatch, calendar, and a calculator
Keeps kids entertained and promotes active play
cons: It's like strapping a game system to your child's wrist
It can be fun but distracting

customer_reviews.title: I found it super reasonably priced on Amazon through the holidays
customer_reviews.text: Even though my daughter is 9.5 years old so is really too old for this, she asked for it for Christmas as several classmates have them at school. I found it super reasonably priced on Amazon through the holidays, so I snagged it. She has played with it a lot since Christmas. I'm sure it will at some point, but I don't see the new wearing off any time soon. My daughter is mature for her age and advanced in school but still enjoys this greatly... if you're on the fence for an older child like I was, mine has really enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: Bbsunyea2

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old granddaughter was longing for a watch after her mother got an apple watch..! of course - that was out of the question...I thought this one would be scorned as babyish and no good and no comparison! BUT...she is thrilled with it - does not seem to be phased by the fact it NOT an Apple ! She loves taking pictures and playing games - and the fact it has to be recharged! So I vote it a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter received this for Christmas, and she absolutely loves it! She feels so big with her "apple watch" and plays on it often. She loves to record herself singing or take pictures of our family and then add funny faces. She also loves the exercise "app" and a few of the games. It holds a charge for a really long time. This is such a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great kids watch, more of a toy than a time keeping device
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a fun watch for my daughter, although it is rather large for a 5 year old. One improvement I wish VTech would consider is a GPS function, which this watch does not have. However the camera and games are nice side features. The battery doesn’t seem to last all day which I also feel could be improved upon. This model is an upgrade for mthe original DX model as the camera is better. I would buy it again as a toy but not as a child’s watch.
customer_reviews.author: TheHobsonHome

customer_reviews.title: This is improved vs 2 years ago version
customer_reviews.text: We lost one that we had for a couple of years. When we purchase this version, it was better than the last. Better screen and better graphics. A selfie camera in addition to the regular camera. Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tech gadget for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This little watch has a lot built in. Well worth the money. My daughter is 7 and wants a cell phone watch. I figured we could see how she does with this first. It has about 5 games and about 10-15 other activities. It has a built in step or move counter. Also she loves the camera! The camera worked a lot better than I thought it was going to. It also has a game for telling time. It’s a pretty awesome little gadget. My 7 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great smart watch :)
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. This is such a cute and practical gift for kids. My niece took so many selfies with this watch and it also has lot of games to keep her busy. Great smart watch for kids!
customer_reviews.author: BlackCanvas

customer_reviews.title: My daugher loves this
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter now have a set of these. My son got his a year or so ago. My daughter got hers this Christmas. She loves it. She plays with it all the time. She enjoys taking pictures with it and just changing the background and the images. The only issue with it is the short battery life on it. I understand that there is a lot going on when she plays with it, but charging it every night can cause a problem if you ever forget. However, I do not know of any way to make cost-effective change in regards to the battery. I would buy it again if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Gundamman

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves thiswatch! She is 5 and is learning the months
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this watch! She is 5 and is learning the months, dates (days), and times with this. She also loves that she has an iWatch like ourselves! She takes pictures and plays games on it. Definitely one of her favorite Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Garcia

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat the price for all this watch does! Huge hit with 4 year old granddaughter and she is still excited about it 3 months later!
customer_reviews.author: Pk

customer_reviews.title: Vtech Kids Watch
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old daughter loves this watch. The graphics are surprisingly good, especially the camera. As long as there’s good lighting, it takes very nice, clear pictures. There are several games in the watch that kids can play. She also uses the alarm feature in the morning. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it & she’s only 2. I determine the age limit based on the child itself. 5 days of play & she already has the swing of things & is still learning. Very entertaining
customer_reviews.author: D.L.T

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my 7 yr old daughter. She loves it! It’s kind of huge on her wrist, so it’s not a wear-all-day kind of watch, but she loves it nonetheless. She plays games and takes photos with it. She’s had it for a while now, and is still pretty into it, which is more than I can say about most of her things.
customer_reviews.author: kelly smith

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't said what it was suppose to be
customer_reviews.text: The watch advertises that it has two cameras and that is what I wanted. I bought this watch in August and held onto it for Christmas, not ever really looking at it. Just today my daughter informed me that her watch doesn't have two cameras. I thought for sure I purchased the one with two. I went back to check my order and sure enough, I did buy the watch with two cameras, but that is not what I received. She was disappointed because that is what she was asking for specifically. Hopefully, this doesn't happen to anyone else. We are all a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for kids/pre-teens. It's classy and durable. The band fits slim wrists on the smallest slot, so it's not an issue for thick wrists but it may not fit very small/thin wrists. Lots of apps and the camera works very well
customer_reviews.author: DadyO

customer_reviews.title: Band rips easily
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this as a 'graduation' gift for my six year old sister. Well it snapped very quickly in just two days of me giving it to her. I don't know but the strap is not as durable as you'de think with its thickness. She can't wear it now and it's practically used a gameboy instead of a watch, which was not the intention of the purchase. And I checked online, there are no replacement bands for this thing unless you buy another watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Crap.  Not as described missing parts
customer_reviews.text: What a POS. I’ve had so many issues with amazon warehouse items. It’s not worth the discount. This watch arrived in an open box (which I expected) but the only thing in the box was the watch! The instruction manual and all accessories including the charger was missing! Then the customer service rep wanted to charge me to have ups pick up the return. Total BS
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Best toy of 2018
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 and got this for Christmas. I didn’t think she was going to like it as it seemed like a “baby” toy based of the apprise age for the Watch. I personally think 4yrs old is too young for this watch. This is by far her most favorite gift she got! I even caught her trying to sneak it to her Dads house, lol.
customer_reviews.author: stubborn T

customer_reviews.title: Loved by my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! Best Buy was the place where she saw it for way more. Amazon was cheaper. Easy to use and you can plug into computer to add more games.
customer_reviews.author: Konniewithakaaay

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality, lasted only a few days...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this watch as a birthday gift from me, her Dad, on her 8th birthday. It worked for only a few days. Now, it won’t charge. She can’t use it at all. What a bummer!! I would recommend looking elsewhere if you want a quality product that you kid will enjoy for more than a blink of an eye...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua James Minuto

customer_reviews.title: Be Weary of all the Positive Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my daughters these watches for Christmas. Unfortunately they are not good quality. The buttons got stuck immediately after opening. We cannot get it to connect to a computer, even after many attempts of troubleshooting and researching forums. The watch will randomly shut off, even if it has a full charge and sometimes it won’t even change! I wish I had done my research beforehand as others have seemed to have these problems too. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: An adorable smart watch that is learning and games combined!
customer_reviews.text: We love this watch. The camera is perfect for my sweet girls fingers and the games keep her attention during waits at restaurants, drs offices or just sitting in carline for sister. I wish it had a texting feature with WiFi but that is my only complaint!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 6 year old for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old for Christmas and she loves it! She loves take pictures and also loves that she can record herself and play it back. The games keep her entertained!

customer_reviews.title: Fun and safe
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves it. No communication which is great for kids Cyber safety but does have fun games and a camera which she loves

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these watches for my nieces and what a hit they are! They are exactly like in the photos and they work perfectly. The camera and games are great. No complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It!  Great Present!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter’s Christmas gift and she was so excited. She wears it regularly and she loves being able to tell the time. She also plays the games, snaps photos and even makes “secret” recordings, which are cute. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year old daughter wanted this for Christmas. We wanted to see how she would handle this before purchasing a more exspensive watch. Well, she loves it! She wears it everyday and thus far takes very good care of it.

customer_reviews.title: Seller replaced the broke one with no hassel
customer_reviews.text: The first watch did not work at all. The screen was blinking and turning off. They replaced it without any issues. We sent the broken one back and the new one is working great. Our daughter loves it.

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: gift for grandchildren. they lovedthem. different color for each child

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!

customer_reviews.title: best value
customer_reviews.text: my child has wanted this for 2 years and amazon had it new for $22 less than walmart! So happy she finally got it and it is durable and new packaging etc. everything i expected!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for daughters as Christmas gifts. Great for young children who are hungry for techy things. They use it often to take videos and recordings as well as some of the games. I know it has parental settings which will be great for when they start school, to limit the amount of time they can use them. Would definitely recommend

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday Present Ever
customer_reviews.text: I gave this VTech Watch to my 5 yr. old grandson. You should have seen his eyes when he opened his gift to find this watch. Of course, he asked for it because we bought one for the 6 yr old granddaughter for Christmas and he keeps going in her room to play with it. They both now enjoy this watch so much and we are happy grandparents for finally giving them something these hi-tech kids like these days. Great gift for 4+.

customer_reviews.title: This won’t help you gain less weight...
customer_reviews.text: “You could have gotten a Fitbit, but that’s boring. This won’t help you gain less weight though.” - my son Seriously though, this is a cute little watch with a lot of customization that my little one loves.

customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my kids for Christmas, they have been using them every day since.

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute, lots of activities, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: After 7 months of use this thing is still going strong. It has games, a camera and other features that make it a nice activity to bring instead of a tablet to keep them busy sometimes. Good buy overall.

customer_reviews.title: Excelente¡¡

product_meta.title: VTech KidiZoom Smartwatch DX2, Purple
product_meta.description: The perfect tech for kids, Kidizoom Smartwatch DX2 by VTech lets them take pictures, videos, play games, tell time and more! Featuring a new sleek and stylish design, this durable smartwatch includes 55 digital and analog customizable watch faces to help kids learn to tell time. This smartwatch features two cameras that allow your child to capture everything from action video to selfies that can be customized in the Silly Yourself app and made into new watch faces. Includes an assortment of new games including Monster Catcher, which uses the camera and augmented reality to help kids find and capture monsters in the real world. Kids can also use the watch's motion sensor for active play challenges or to track steps. Using the included Micro-USB cable, upload photos and videos as well as recharge the battery. The Kidizoom Smartwatch DX2 is a great multifunction watch like Mom & Dad's, designed just for kids!
feature_bullets: Two cameras allow you to take video and selfies that can be customized and made into new watch faces
Helps kids learn to tell time and has 55 digital and analog clock faces that they can customize
New Monster Catcher game creates an augmented reality gaming experience where you can capture monsters in the real world
Includes a motion sensor for active play challenges and a pedometer

Using the included Micro-USB cable, upload photos and videos, recharge the battery and download extra free content like games and seasonal clock faces from VTech's Learning Lodge. Kidizoom Smartwatch DX2 is intended for ages 4 to 12 years

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars602 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
